title: Schedule LNG Cargo Loading
description: An LNG plant scheduler creates a plan to load an LNG carrier that is due to arrive in three days.

tasks.description: Check the LNG storage tank inventory to ensure there is enough product available to fill the ship.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms sufficient LNG inventory is on hand.

tasks.description: Review the ship's specifications to determine its cargo capacity and the required loading time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required loading volume and duration are identified.

tasks.description: Create a loading schedule in the terminal operations system and reserve the jetty for the vessel's ETA.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vessel is officially scheduled, and the jetty is booked.
